mapper.sql: user.id as user_id, user.name as user_name, user.password as user_password, user.type as user_type, user.status as user_status, user.sort as user_sort, user.login_ip as user_login_ip, user.login_time as user_login_time, user.create_by as user_create_by, user.create_time as user_create_time, user.update_by as user_update_by, user.update_time as user_update_time, user.Remarks as user_Remarks
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from sys_user user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, name, password, type, status, sort, login_ip, login_time, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, Remarks) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
